author: neilg
msg: fix ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException that would result if one parsed a doc with an incomplete PI or comment.  Regression from XNI change of 01/22.

author: sandygao
msg: 1. sometimes we failed to find a component from an imported document;
2. sometimes we failed to report an error for references to components in a
namespace which is not imported into the current schema document.

author: elena
msg: Cloning an Attribute always clones its children, since they represent its value,
no matter whether this is a deep clone or not

msg: Updated features doc for string-interning feature. Default is true.
